"""Test Gaussian process predictions with sensitivity analysis."""
train_features, train_targets, test_features, test_targets = get_data()
kdict = [{'type': 'gaussian', 'width': 30.0, 'scaling': 5.0}]
sen = SensitivityAnalysis(train_matrix=train_features[:, :5], train_targets
    =train_targets, test_matrix=test_features[:, :5], kernel_list=kdict,
    init_reg=np.sqrt(0.001), init_width=10.0)
sen.backward_selection(predict=True, test_targets=test_targets, selection=3)
